actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 771 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to make scholarships available to provide clinical psychologists for Indians.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to make clinical psychologists eligible for Indian Health Scholarships.

titles.title: A bill to make scholarships available to provide clinical psychologists for Indians.
